item.title: Add Lunr Search to Hugo site
item.author: Shiva Inampudi
item.description: Why Lunr? Hugo ships with out search, yet I love it. However, I’ve managed to integrate lunr search that is supported by the theme Loveit I’m using on this website. With that being said, this post will cover how I integrate lurn on my website - for demo, go ahead and search for something on this website :) Install and update! Make sure you the following installed/updated Hugo NPM hugo-lunr Today, there are handfull of search tools available for Hugo websites.
